commands.name: engine
commands.trBrief: Maintain and control the build engine

commands.name: tools
commands.trSynopsis:
[tooling|target] list [-a|--available] [--slow]
[tooling|target] update <name>
[tooling|target] register [--user <user> [--password <password>]] {--all|<name>}
[tooling|target] install <name>
[tooling|target] install-custom <name> {<URL>|<file>} [--tooling <tooling>] [--no-snapshot]
[tooling|target] clone <name> <clone-name>
[tooling|target] remove [--snapshots-of] <name>
[tooling|target] package-search <name> [<pattern>...]
[tooling|target] package-install <name> <package>...
[tooling|target] package-remove <name> <package>...
[tooling|target] exec <name> [<command> [<arg>...]]
